title: Dr. Drew Pinsky On Looking Into the Genetic Heritage Of Mass Shooters
text:
Dr. Drew Pinsky joined Brian Kilmeade to discuss the psychology behind many of the recent mass shootings. Dr. Drew believes the vast majority of mass shootings have mental health issues, and feels we need to look into the genetics of the shooters because 60% of our behavior is related to our genetics. Dr. Drew says he supports the 2nd Amendment but also believes red flag laws are a good place to start. He said the idea of individual liberties has begun to not just impinge on the well-being and rights of the community, it's destroyed us.

Plus, Dr. Drew also discussed the story about an Australian vegan who took her neighbors to court over the smell of meat and fish from their barbecue, as well as Debra Messing and Eric McCormack wanting donors of President Trump to be made public.
